mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DONATION_INFO_NO ,MEMBER_NAME FROM DONATION_INFO LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE SUBSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, -2, INSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, '_')) = '_1' UNION ALL SELECT NON_DONATION_NO ,MEMBER_NAME FROM TEST_NON_DONATION)

SELECT * FROM (SELECT DONATION_INFO_NO , MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, DONATION_CONTENT, CASE WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'O' THEN '일시' WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'R' THEN '정기' ELSE DONATION_TYPE END AS DONATION_TYPE ,DONATION_AMOUNT , DONATION_DATE , DONATION_STATUS ,'회원' AS MEMBER_YN FROM DONATION_INFO LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE SUBSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, -2, INSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, '_')) = '_1' UNION ALL SELECT NON_DONATION_NO , MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, DONATION_CONTENT, CASE WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'O' THEN '일시' ELSE DONATION_TYPE END AS DONATION_TYPE ,DONATION_AMOUNT , DONATION_DATE , DONATION_STATUS ,'비회원' AS MEMBER_YN FROM TEST_NON_DONATION) ORDER BY DONATION_DATE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT DONATION_INFO_NO ,MEMBER_NAME FROM DONATION_INFO LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE SUBSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, -2, INSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, '_')) = '_1' UNION ALL SELECT NON_DONATION_NO ,MEMBER_NAME FROM TEST_NON_DONATION) WHERE MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{donationSearch} || '%'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT DONATION_INFO_NO , MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, DONATION_CONTENT, CASE WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'O' THEN '일시' WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'R' THEN '정기' ELSE DONATION_TYPE END AS DONATION_TYPE ,DONATION_AMOUNT , DONATION_DATE , DONATION_STATUS ,'회원' AS MEMBER_YN FROM DONATION_INFO LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) UNION ALL SELECT NON_DONATION_NO , MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, DONATION_CONTENT, CASE WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'O' THEN '일시' ELSE DONATION_TYPE END AS DONATION_TYPE ,DONATION_AMOUNT , DONATION_DATE , DONATION_STATUS ,'비회원' AS MEMBER_YN FROM TEST_NON_DONATION) WHERE MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{donationSearch} || '%' ORDER BY DONATION_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(DONATION_INFO_NO) FROM DONATION_INFO LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SUBSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, -2, INSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, '_')) = '_1'

SELECT DONATION_INFO_NO , MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, DONATION_UID, DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, DONATION_CARD, DONATION_CONTENT, CASE WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'O' THEN '일시' WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'R' THEN '정기' ELSE DONATION_TYPE END AS DONATION_TYPE ,DONATION_AMOUNT ,BILLINGKEY, DONATION_RECEIPT, DONATION_DATE , DONATION_STATUS , CANCEL_YN FROM DONATION_INFO LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND SUBSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, -2, INSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, '_')) = '_1' ORDER BY DONATION_DATE DESC

SELECT DONATION_INFO_NO , MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, DONATION_UID, DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, DONATION_CARD, DONATION_CONTENT, CASE WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'O' THEN '일시' WHEN DONATION_TYPE = 'R' THEN '정기' ELSE DONATION_TYPE END AS DONATION_TYPE ,DONATION_AMOUNT ,BILLINGKEY, DONATION_RECEIPT, DONATION_DATE , DONATION_STATUS , CANCEL_YN FROM DONATION_INFO LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DONATION_MERCHANT_UID LIKE '%' || #{extractedValue}||'%' ORDER BY DONATION_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE DONATION_INFO SET CANCEL_YN = 'Y' WHERE DONATION_MERCHANT_UID LIKE '%' || #{merchantData} ||'%'
mapper.select: SELECT DONATION_INFO_NO , MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, DONATION_UID, DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, DONATION_CARD, DONATION_CONTENT, DONATION_AMOUNT ,BILLINGKEY, DONATION_RECEIPT, DONATION_DATE , DONATION_STATUS , CANCEL_YN FROM DONATION_INFO LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE DONATION_INFO_NO = #{donationNo} AND SUBSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, -2, INSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, '_')) = '_1'

SELECT DONATION_DATE, TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, -1 * INSTR(REVERSE(DONATION_MERCHANT_UID), '_') + 1)) AS MERCHANT_NO FROM ( SELECT DONATION_MERCHANT_UID, DONATION_DATE FROM DONATION_INFO WHERE DONATION_MERCHANT_UID LIKE '%'|| #{merchant} ||'%' ORDER BY DONATION_DATE DESC, DONATION_INFO_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
